## Promisify type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
type Promisify<T> = {
	[P in keyof T]: T[P] extends (...args: infer A) => infer R
		? R extends void | Promise<any>
			? T[P]
			: (...args: A) => Promise<ReturnType<T[P]>>
		: Promise<T[P]>;
};
```
